alert.note: Alert for Magoffin; Morgan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 5:55PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Morgan, northwestern Magoffin and northeastern Wolfe Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 555 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Demund, or 7 miles southwest of West Liberty, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Nickell and Lizzielane around 600 PM EDT. Panama, Payton, Greear, Adele and Liberty Road around 605 PM EDT. West Liberty, Stacy Fork, Cannel City and Index around 610 PM EDT. Lewis, Well Station, Caney, Malone, Gordon Ford, Burg and Wheel Rim around 615 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Holliday, Lykins, Netty, Williams, Harper, White Oak, Cottle, Hager, Epson, Wonnie, Matthew, Bethanna, Florress, Kernie, Stella and Ova. THIS INCLUDES Bert T. Combs Mountain Parkway between mile markers 57 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
